content.label: Easily my favorite FF of all time. Wish it had the Re-Make treatment, but still love the nostalgia at my fingertips. Had to reduce the stars down due to the game being broken after last major iOS update. SE fixed it and the game runs perfectly now.

Square Enix has updated the game so menus aren’t bugged out and unusable anymore. To me, the graphics still look a little stretched when playing on an iPhone… But otherwise, it’s great to have this timeless classic back!

title.label: Newest update added iPhone X support!

content.label: Thank you for the update! I hope other games get this treatment too!
Why would you still offer this to people on iPhones when it doesn’t work on the most updated iOS. This is shady business.
Overall great reproduction.  However the text in the menus do not show up in battles.  As well as the pause menu when equipping or using skills.  Please update to work with OS 13!
It’s is a wonderful game. But It is currently not working on IOS13, menus do NOT show up in game. So unless you get lucky or remember the exact placement of menu locations it will not work correctly.
I just bought the game and when I am in combat or out of combat I can’t see the albums for attack defend or even items. I’m playing on iPhone8!!! Please help!!!

I love this game and the series itself a ton. I love this game specifically too, but there’s been this glitch that makes it near impossible to play. The menu. When I open up the menu at the start of the game to fix settings to my preferences it’s just gone. It shows part of the item’s tab and that’s it. I tried just clicking on it but that brought up more bugs. In the main menu you can see the left half of the game with the characters. Once you enter a sub menu only the top left remains visible. The rest is gone and I can hardly interact with it. If it weren’t for that, this game would get a super solid 4-5 stars.

title.label: Please update for iOS. Just downloaded and it's not payable

content.label: Love this game. Very excited to see it in action. Please code the update for the new iOS.
Since the IOS 13 update, the app hasn’t been able to run properly. It’s been a month and the devs won’t fix this. What a shame! Please, save your money for something else.

title.label: Chinese version does not display properly on my iPhone X

content.label: I cannot see menu items and battle command which made it completely unplayable

Unplayable, menu options do not appear after iOS 13

Update 11/16

*** Fix this game yo!
iOS 13 released two months ago and this app still has not been updated to work with it. Very disappointing.
Do not pay money and download until fixed
In game Menus after the iOS 13 update are missing still, when will there be a fix????

title.label: Great game but it needs to be fixed.

content.label: I live this game. Only issue right now is the compatibility with the new iOS. I can’t see the menu buttons and the combat is all screwy. Hopefully the ETA on getting this fixed is soon.

title.label: Not playable as is due to iOS update

content.label:
The recent iOS update caused menu screens to blank out, will update review when the issue is fixed

Edit: it’s been months and the issue is still unresolved.
Menus don’t work on iOS 13. This should be pulled from the store until fixed.  Issue has been know for more than 2 months.

It is painful and dishonorable to offer no support for a child !! 
  Alas I love the classic ff games... so at the whims of squareenix I must be, updating my medium of play to iOS 13 has cast a shadow upon my nostalgia!! 
  The great Kazushige would have turned his face away from such shame! 
  For those out there who have a fondness for the turn based classics, not one phoenix down. 
  Doomed am I to sit 20 hours into a game that now is unplayable? 
  I feel wronged! It seems that this child of squaresoft has been allowed to be forgotten.
  So my fellow students of turned based final fantasy I ask these questions : 

Do we not deserve support for our “child” ?

Should we pay almost twice as much as most games for the honor to be forgotten?
  
 A shadow has fallen across the face of squaresoft,
 and I sorrow.

title.label: This game still doesn’t work with iOS 13

content.label: It’s completely unplayable with the menu issue. If you have iOS 13 DO NOT BUY until it’s fixed.

Can’t see any menu or action buttons. Trying to fight blind, can’t select proper magic or attacks. Just fighting blind. Not buying anything from square-enix again. Just when I thought that BS all the bravest was the worst thing they could do, they trolled me with a destroyed version of something great...

SE needs to update for iOS 13/iPhone 11. Not compatible at all with current phones. Menu options not visible and selecting options in battle made impossible. Hopeful they get around to updating it to work!
Menus are completely broken with iOS 13. This is not an exaggeration, the game is unplayable and Apple needs to take this game down until it is fixed.

Ever since I updated my phone, I haven’t been able to see any menu options and commands don’t work. I have tried deleting and redownloading the app, turning my phone off and on again... but I think the app just needs to be updated for newer IOS versions!

This application doesn’t work at all. Don’t buy it. You can’t play the game because the menus don’t show up. This isn’t a cheap-o $1.99 game. Paying $14.99 for a game that doesn’t even work and then not allowing users to get their money back boarders on the line of a criminal scam. 

I thought this type of thing was a violation of your terms Apple? Why don’t you pull this game from the App Store?
I can no longer see the menus during battles.  I’ve checked Reddit and I’m not alone with this issue.

Great game! Love this game! But it isn’t working on my iPhone 11 pro max! I can’t click on anything I can still run around in the world but I can click on attack or items or spells or anything. Nothing shows up! Please fix this ASAP so I can enjoy the game again. Thank you.

None of the menus work for any section. I paid $16 for the app and I can’t play it or return it. There has not been a patch for the game in 3yrs. I only gave it two stars because I love this game so much I couldn’t give it one. This rendition at the moment is impossible to play

Since my iPhone has upgraded to the latest iOS version, the menus are now invisible!  I bought this game so excited as it was one of my favorites as a child, made it to the floating continent when things are getting good, and this update to my iPhone has made this game incomparable! Please help!
Can you please fix the game. I recently purchased this app and it is unplayable due to the screens in the battle menu not opening. Very annoying, considering i spent $15 on this.
Words are missing in menus since iOS 13.
Menus are invisible. Don’t buy this until it’s fixed. I doubt it will be any time soon.

I downloaded and installed on an iPhone XS running iOS 12 (now upgrade to iOS 13, still not working). The battle menus do not appear on screen-they are simply blank. The same thing happens with the general menu-it is just not there. This makes the game unplayable and I’m hoping they get around to fixing it soon because I would love to play this game I’ve bought which is unplayable on my device. Will update my review if/when they fix the game.

I bought this game just over a month ago. Ever since the latest update for IPhone the game is not working well. The words in the command menu and dialogue boxes no longer show up so you can’t really play the game. Please fix this or give people’s money back.

title.label: Needs an update can’t even see main menu or battle menu

content.label: Great game worked fine until I got IOS 13 now you can’t even see the main menu with the party or even choose what commands to use in battle because the text won’t even show up.   And there is nowhere to even contact anyone about an issue with the game.
Like everybody has said the game menu and attack menus are all messed up and blank game hard to play when it needs a major update for a paid game it’s not looking good for ratings if not updated
The iOS 13 update broke the game. Menus don’t work, things are cut off, etc. This game needs fixed. Don’t buy until there is a current update.

title.label: IOS13 has been out since September 19 2019.  Still waiting

content.label: The text are not showing up properly during battle and also in menu
Menu will not work in iOS 13
The menus do not work properly and appear blank. I think there are supposed to be options on the screen that are not appearing. When is this going to be fixed?
This game should no longer be for sale until issues with iOS 13 compatibility are fixed. As others have stated, menus are broken making the game unplayable.

Please help I’ve owned this game before and didn’t have this issue but the menus are blank or they’re cut off halfway it is very hard to battle when I can’t see selections I have deleted and reinstalled couple times but still same thing

I know it’s stated that it’s having problems with IOS 13 but when is this going to be fixed! I just bought a game I can’t play because all the button icons are not there anymore in combat and just on the menu screen! Live the game before this happened...
Great game, but unplayable on the most recent iPhone update (as of 10/13/2019).   All the important menus to navigate fighting or saving/equipping items are invisible and glitches out .
Completely unplayable, after IOS 13 update I can’t even select anything in the menu. Please Fix this problem Square!

I just downloaded this game and the menus are unusable. SOME of the menus show up sometimes.For thee most part you are just guessing. How did this even get through the review process. 

I am guessing this is a new issue. Hoping it gets fixed soon.

This game is amazing, however Square Enix continues to show how their bottom line is dictated by a simple actuarial value. Almost expected of American companies but a complete disgrace to the culture that birthed them. I wonder when they will lose complete sight of the art they use to practice. I haven’t been able to play this for months because you can’t see the menu options in game. There is nothing you can do but guess what buttons you are hitting. I’m sure there is a simple answer but Square cares more about new ways to make money than maintaining another horrible port to the point where it isn’t even playable. Avoid if you want a game that was made to be played.

Not sure where to report this. iOS version 13.1.2

I cannot view the menu bar on the right and the 4th character slot only shows the character, no stars
I have a glitch where menu and attack commands does not display any text.

Just wanna say this is my favorite game of all time but right now the attack menu is just blank.  I can't choose magic attack defend or anything.  Hopefully this will be fixed soon.  I tried using the contact option to get a hold of square but wasn't nearly as easy as just writing a review
